item.title: I need a code for unlimited spec
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“Randomking17, post:8, topic:228342”]Search “custom” in Client.java…

Add this underneath anything.

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights > 3){ specialAmount += 5000; specAttack(); }[/quote]

I recognize that, you ripped it from DeltaScape.

Try this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Max") && (playerRights >= 1)) { specialAmount = 50000; sendMessage("Your special bar is now maxed out."); }

This is in my source. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a code for unlimited spec
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Ok try searching zamgodsword in client.java

you should find something that looks a bit like this,

} if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount <= 0) { // zamgodsword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount >= 1) { // zamgodsword startAnimation(1499); stillgfx(437, absY, absX); stillgfx(293, absY, absX); stillgfx(379, absY, absX); sendMessage("Everything starts to burn around you!!"); specialDamage = 45 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 1;

Change everything that is there to what is in my coding ^^

Making Owner rights.

Find this is client.java

       public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

Basically, add this directly under that

if (ItemID == 15336 && playerRights <= 2) { return 100000;

item.source: I need a code for unlimited spec

item.title: I need a code for unlimited spec
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Its not that hard
Take a look at this

} if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14663 && specialAmount <= 0) { // Keris specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14663 && specialAmount >= 1) { // Keris DDSSpecial(); specialAmount -= 1;

This is the coding for my owner only keris dagger, (and it actually is owner only, when an admin or any other player tries to equip it, it will just say you need 100000 attack to wear this, but actually you just need owner rights. Coded by me :D)

Have a look at it again

        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14663 && specialAmount <= 0) { // Keris

That says if player has 0 spec left, then send message you have no spec left. duh.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14663 && specialAmount >= 1) { // Keris DDSSpecial(); specialAmount -= 1;[/

This says, if special amount = 1, then perform the special, basically.
The specialAmount -= 1; bit means, take 1 special point away from the spec bar.

But because of the special bar replenish rate being quicker than the loss of special rate, it makes it so you have infinite special

Basically, just search that stuff in client.java, and you should find it.

Good luck, if you want to know more, i am a very good coder, then just ask

Read full topic
